page.title: 16Carnival Day (8th June 1985)
page.content:
Each year there is a theme and this year it was 'make believe'.
There are a number of different competitions - the best float,best walker, best group of walkers... Many organisations and individuals took part. The overall winner was a float by Bulkington Mothers dressed as characters from Quality Street chocolate. Lex Wilkinson won their class with a giant mushroom,surrounded by gnomes collecting money in their out- streached fishing nets. The Girl Guides showed what fun camping was and the Boy Scouts represented the Wizard of Oz. George Eliot Hospital had good fairies at one end of the float and wicked witches at the other.
